item.title: FORMAL NOTICE to McDonald’s executives, including future CEO Chris Kempczinski, about the illegality of the McDonald’s Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: FORMAL NOTICE : ILLEGAL LOTTERY USA Date sent: February 14, 2017, 23:21 (Beijing time) To: Chris Kempczinski, Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>, Silvia Lagnado (Silvia.Lagnado@us.mcd.com), Deborah Wahl <Deborah.Wahl@us.mcd.com> THIS EMAIL CONTAINS WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE VERY IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION. DON’T DISREGARD IT! Dear Sir or Madam, This a formal notice to warn you that your McDonald’s Monopoly sweepstakes in the United States actually qualifies, to the best of my knowledge, as an illegal lottery!
